intro: Rhodochlamys, commonly known as the sweet pepper or capsicum, is a genus of flowering plants in the nightshade family, Solanaceae. These plants are characterized by their vibrant, showy flowers and are native to the Americas. The genus includes several species, some of which are widely cultivated for their nutritional and medicinal properties.
